properties.name: extractionValues
properties.description: The key under which the extracted value should be saved

properties.name: returnValue
properties.description: Get an attribute value like "class" from an element

properties.name: HTML
properties.description: Get the HTML the element contains

properties.name: Text
properties.description: Get only the text content of the element

properties.name: Value
properties.description: Get value of an input, select or textarea

properties.name: attribute
properties.description: The name of the attribute to return the value off

properties.name: returnArray
properties.description: Whether to return the values as an array so if multiple ones get found they also get returned separately. If not set all will be returned as a single string.

properties.name: options
properties.description: Whether to remove automatically all spaces and newlines from the beginning and end of the values
